item.description: No snacks will be provided but you are encouraged to bring some to share!
item.how_to_find_us: This is on South Rd in Brentwood between 107/Marshall Rd and 125/Calef Hwy closer to Marshall Rd. Shoot me an email if you have any trouble mapquesting it.
item.why: Everyone loves boardgames... plus it is a chance to meet new people!

group.name: The Portsmouth, NH / Seacoast Boardgames Group

item.name: Boardgames in Brentwood
